name: Robot Hordes
description:
(Recommended to play in Fullscreen Mode. Press Escape to exit Fullscreen.)

Welcome to my first published game. It's a simple horde shooter. Survive as many waves of robots as you can before they overwhelm and kill you.

This is a game I can definitely add more on, and if people give positive feedback or if I feel like it, there are features and other things I can add to the game in the future. As it is my first game, it isn't going to be perfect, but I am proud of it as a neat little thing I did.

This was made for a final school project I did for my first semester using the Unity Engine.

Bug: If Shift is held (Like to sprint in most other shooters), the player freezes. I may either make shift do nothing or just add a sprint in the future, hmm...
